name: nk-md
description: :art: Preview enki insight files in a separate window.

scripts.package: npm run pack-linux-ia32 && npm run pack-linux-x64 && npm run pack-win32-ia32 && npm run pack-win32-x64 && npm run pack-mac
scripts.prerelease: git tag ${npm_package_version} && git push --tags && npm run package

releases.name: nk-md v0.1.2
releases.body:
- Fix opening the `.app` directly
- Update to electron@1.4.14

releases.name: nk-md v0.1.1
releases.body:
- Nicer empty screen
- Red box when the insight parser fails
